descript.abstract: Location and characteristics of 1,124 individual mineral deposits of this type, with grade and tonnage models for chromium as well as several related elements.
descript.purpose: Provide factual support for the development of mineral deposit models that can be used in regional and national mineral resource assessments It is not our intent to include every known deposit in the world. More importantly, for this study, the regions selected are considered well studied, with detailed deposit descriptions, maps and sections of ore bodies, and production or reserve data for most of the podiform chromite deposits

browse.browsed: Simplified global map showing deposit locations, (540 x 270 pixels)

enttyp.enttypd: Descriptive information about the deposit and its environs

attr.attrdef: Record ID. Unique identifying number for the record, links to related rows in other tables. Integer of width 4.
Name of deposit. Name most recently used for the deposit. Textual values of no more than 60 characters.
Other names. Alternative names that have been used for the deposit. Textual values of no more than 81 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 786 records have no value for altname.

attr.attrdef: Includes. Names of deposits that have been included in this description due to their proximity. Textual values of no more than 90 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 1069 records have no value for includes.

attr.attrdef: Country. Country in which the deposit is located. Textual values of no more than 13 characters.
Country code. Short code indicating country and state or province containing the deposit. Textual values of no more than 4 characters.
State or province. Name of the state or province where the deposit is located. Textual values of no more than 34 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 34 records have no value for stprov.

attr.attrdef: Latitude. Geographic latitude in decimal degrees, WGS84. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 79 records have no value for latitude.

attr.attrdef: Longitude. Geographic longitude in decimal degrees, WGS84. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 79 records have no value for longitude.

attr.attrdef: Latitude degrees. Degrees of latitude. Integer of width 2.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 79 records have no value for latdeg.

attr.attrdef: Latitude minutes. Minutes of latitude. Integer of width 2.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 79 records have no value for latmin.

attr.attrdef: Latitude seconds. Seconds of latitude. Integer of width 2.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 80 records have no value for latsec.

attr.attrdef: Longitude degrees. Degrees of longitude. Integer of width 3.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 79 records have no value for londeg.

attr.attrdef: Longitude minutes. Minutes of longitude. Integer of width 2.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 79 records have no value for lonmin.

attr.attrdef: Longitude seconds. Seconds of longitude. Integer of width 2.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 80 records have no value for lonsec.

attr.attrdef: Location accuracy. General assessment of the location accuracy: Accurate if point location is based on a surface mine, tailings, or surface disturbance; Approximate if a general location given by description or from a large-scale map or where surface indications could not be seen; Uncertain if the location given is within an ultramafic body or geographic area where the deposit is known to be, but the exact location is not known, or may be an unverified mine, tailing pile, or surface disturbance; blank value indicates accurracy cannot be assessed. Textual values of no more than 11 characters.
Model type. Subtype of podiform chromite deposit as determined by the grade and tonnage models. Textual values of no more than 15 characters.

Paleotectonic setting. Paleotectonic setting, a preliminary categorization of the deposit according to the tectonic setting in which the deposit formed, midocean ridge, off-ridge, or suprasubduction. Textual values of no more than 15 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 58 records have no value for tectset.

attr.attrdef: Ophiolite zone. Stratigraphic position of the deposit within an ophiolite sequence: cumulate, transition, or tectonite. Textual values of no more than 10 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 132 records have no value for ophzone.

attr.attrdef: Tonnage. Tonnage of ore, in millions of metric tons. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 209 records have no value for oreton.

attr.attrdef: Chromic oxide grade. Chromic oxide grade as percentage of the oxide in the deposit. Real numbers stored in double precision.

attr.attrdef: Rhodium grade. Rhodium grade as grams per metric ton of the deposit. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 973 records have no value for rhgrd.

attr.attrdef: Palladium grade. Palladium grade as grams per metric ton of the deposit. Real numbers stored in double precision.

attr.attrdef: Cr. Chromium concentration as percentage of the deposit. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 1074 records have no value for crpct.

attr.attrdef: Cr:Fe ratio. Ratio of the chromium concentration to iron concentration. Real numbers stored in double precision.

attr.attrdef: Deposit type. Type of podiform chromite deposit. Textual values of no more than 24 characters.
Deposit form. General form of the deposit as reported in the literature. Textual values of no more than 59 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 251 records have no value for depform.

attr.attrdef: Deposit texture. Texture of the deposit as reported in the literature. Textual values of no more than 75 characters.

attr.attrdef: Ore type. Type of ore present in the deposit: metallurgical, refractory, or chemical. Textual values of no more than 13 characters.
Age of deposit. Geochronologic unit during which the deposit was formed. Textual values of no more than 119 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 7 records have no value for depage.

attr.attrdef: Age (my). Age of the deposit in millions of years before the present, based on reported radiometric ages or the midpoints of geochronologic units. Integer of width 4.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 7 records have no value for agemy.

attr.attrdef: Host rocks. Lithologic terms describing the rocks that host the deposit. Textual values of no more than 43 characters.
Host length. Length of the host rock body, in meters. Integer of width 6.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 109 records have no value for hostlen.

attr.attrdef: Host width. Width of the host rock body, in meters. Integer of width 6.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 109 records have no value for hostwid.

attr.attrdef: Area of deposit. Area of the deposit in plan view, in square meters. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 612 records have no value for deparea.

attr.attrdef: A-axis of ore. Length of the major axis of the ellipse best representing the deposit in plan view, in meters. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 625 records have no value for ore_a.

attr.attrdef: B-axis of ore. Length of the minor axis of the ellipse best representing the deposit in plan view, in meters. Real numbers stored in double precision.

attr.attrdef: Mine depth. Depth of the deepest part of workings, in meters below the ground surface. Real numbers stored in double precision.

attr.attrdef: Depth to ore. Thickness of the covering material, in meters. Real numbers stored in double precision.
Anomaly type. Type of geophysical anomaly at the deposit site. Textual values of no more than 60 characters.

attr.attrdef: Deposit types within 10km. Types of mineral deposits found within 10km of the deposit, whether economic or not. Textual values of no more than 198 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 12 records have no value for dep10km.

attr.attrdef: Discovery date. Date the deposit was discovered. Textual values of no more than 14 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 622 records have no value for discdate.

attr.attrdef: Startup date. Date of first mining or production, if known. Textual values of no more than 12 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 600 records have no value for startdate.

attr.attrdef: Comments. Additional information about the site or commodities; may include supplementary information about incompletely explored deposits, undetermined tonnages and grades, as well as grades of additional elements, such as P, Ni, Au, Cu, Co, and others, when available. Textual values of no more than 254 characters.

enttyp.enttypd: Minerals reported at the site. May include generic names such as carbonates or pyroxene. Due to variation in the level of detail given in published reports, the lists of minerals for most of the deposits should not be regarded as complete

attr.attrdef: Record ID. Unique identifying number for a site, a value of main:rec_id. Integer of width 4.
Mineral name. Mineral name. Textual values of no more than 31 characters.

enttyp.enttypd: Rock types on a regional map found within 5km of the deposit

attr.attrdef: Record ID. Unique identifying number for a site, a value of main:rec_id. Integer of width 4.
Rock type. Rock type. Textual values of no more than 32 characters.

enttyp.enttypd: Bibliographic references providing information about the deposit or commodity information

attr.attrdef: Record ID. Unique identifying number for a site, a value of main:rec_id. Integer of width 4.
Reference. Bibliographic reference, formatted as typically seen in a scientific publication. Textual values of no more than 254 characters.
Online linkage. URL for an online version of the report.

distinfo.distliab: Any trade names used in the data or report are for information only and do not imply an endorsement by the U.S. Government.
